chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The battery is not functioning as expected.
Thank you,

Dear Ecomobile:

It is a pleasure to contact you.

The reason for my message is to inform you that the customer proceeded with the return of the phone, but the tracking link does not show updates.

Here is the link: https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=XJ335712367JF

I would appreciate if you could provide me with the non-receipt document as soon as possible to proceed with an investigation to the carrier with the corresponding equipment.

I look forward to your message and cooperation.

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are currently checking with our logistics partner regarding the receival of the parcel. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Regards,
YR

Dear Backcare,

We have not received the parcel. Attached is the CND.

Regards,
KJ

Dear ecomobile:

It is a pleasure to greet you.

Thank you for providing the documentation.

I want to inform you that the client is still in his term, and we are waiting for him to provide us with the documentation.

We will keep you informed

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We will be awaiting for your reply. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello, ecomobile:

I hope you are feeling well.

We are waiting for a response from the customer shortly we will inform you the next step.

Have a nice day.

Sincerely
Diego, Back Market Customer Service

Dear BAckcare,

We take note of your message.

Regards,
JH

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<< and we have seen that the device has been marked as delivered to you as of 05/06/2024, and in view of this, the two working days deadline for reimbursement has been met. 

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Jose Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
